Items.description:
These beets are hot!

Very spicy and can warm people up.

Some say the paper cuts you get from these improve your eyesight.

Lots of fiber and very healthy.

A piece of rock you found from the ground that looks like a potato.

Very tough and chewy. Great for the hardy.

Ginger bread man. Talks alot.

Sweet and good to cheer up somebody's day.

A turnip with a knife in it.

Sharp! Be careful.
